# bundleID

**Instance Property**

The bundle identifier that the app transaction applies to.

## Declaration

```swift
let bundleID: String
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/AppTransaction/bundleID] is the bundle identifier string that you entered in Xcode. For more information, see [https://help.apple.com/xcode/mac/current/#/deve70ea917b]

## Getting app and version information

- **appVersion**: The app version that the app transaction applies to.
- **originalAppVersion**: The app version that the customer originally purchased from the App Store.
- **appID**: The unique identifier the App Store uses to identify the app.
- **appVersionID**: The number that the App Store uses to uniquely identify the version of the app.
